Label: Respondent sequence number
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Strenuous exercise in the past 3 days?
Comment: In the past 3 days, did {you/SP} do any strenuous exercise or heavy physical work?
Note: PROBE IF NEEDED: Strenuous exercise or heavy physical work is exercise or work that causes large increases in breathing or heart rate if they are done for at least 10 minutes continuously.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Did exercise make muscles sore/painful
Comment: Did it make {your/SP's} muscles sore or painful?
Note: INTERVIEWER INSTRUCTION: DO NOT INCLUDE JOINT PAIN.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Past 3 days muscle injury, bruise, injct
Comment: In the past 3 days, {have you/has SP} had a muscle injury, bruise or injection? (Do not include insulin or allergy injections.)
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Injury/injct made muscles sore/painful
Comment: Did it make {your/SP's} muscles sore or painful?
Note: INTERVIEWER INSTRUCTION: DO NOT INCLUDE JOINT PAIN.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Other muscle pain/soreness last 3 days
Comment: In the last 3 days, have {you/SP} had any muscle pain or soreness?
Note: INTERVIEWER INSTRUCTION: DO NOT INCLUDE JOINT PAIN.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Quantity: how long pain/aching/soreness
Comment: For how many days, weeks, months or years long {have you/has SP} had this pain, aching or soreness?
Note: INTERVIEWER INSTRUCTION: IF SP HAS HAD PAIN AT TWO OR MORE SITES, ENTER THE VALUE FOR THE SITE WHERE THE SP HAD MUSCLE PAIN THE LONGEST.ENTER NUMBER (OF DAYS, WEEKS, MONTHS OR YEARS)
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Unit: how long pain/aching/soreness
Comment: For how many days, weeks, months or years long {have you/has SP} had this pain, aching or soreness?
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS
